comments:
After successfully compiling the Spacewar project files

The problem here is that the current JBuilder plugin does not support JBuilder 
X.  Support for that version of JBuilder will be released shortly after 
AspectJ 1.2.



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 51096 ***
